title: Convert Alliance 002_ElwynnForest.lua
description:
Convert VanillaGuide 002_ElwynnForest.lua to TurtleGuide format.

Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/isalcedo/VanillaGuide/master/GuideTables/Alliance/002_ElwynnForest.lua
Output: Guides/Optimized/Alliance/01_12_Elwynn_Forest.lua

Steps:
1. Fetch the source file
2. Parse each { str, x, y, zone } item
3. Convert to TourGuide format with action codes (A/T/C/R/N)
4. Look up Quest IDs from pfQuest database or classic.wowhead.com
5. Register as: TurtleGuide:RegisterGuide("Optimized/Elwynn Forest (1-12)", "Optimized/Darkshore (12-14)", "Alliance", ...)
6. Add to Guides/Optimized/Alliance/Guides.xml

title: Convert Alliance 003_Alliance_12to20.lua
description: Convert VanillaGuide 003_Alliance_12to20.lua remaining brackets to optimized format. DONE: [1214] and [1417] already converted as 12_14_Darkshore.lua and 14_17_Darkshore.lua. REMAINING: [1718] Loch Modan 17-18, [1820] Redridge 18-20. EXAMPLES: See Guides/Optimized/Alliance/12_14_Darkshore.lua and 14_17_Darkshore.lua. SOURCE: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/isalcedo/VanillaGuide/master/GuideTables/Alliance/003_Alliance_12to20.lua

title: Add branch-and-rejoin guide selection logic
description: Add logic to allow players to branch off optimized path to complete any zone, then rejoin optimized path at their current level. DEPENDS ON: Routes.lua update completing.

title: Update Routes.lua to use Optimized guides
description: Update Routes.lua to use Optimized guides instead of zone completion guides for race-specific progression. DEPENDS ON: Conversion tasks completing. REFERENCE: See current Routes.lua structure and Guides/Optimized/ for new guide names.

title: Convert VanillaGuide to TurtleGuide format
description: Convert VanillaGuide quest order to TurtleGuide format. See completed examples in Guides/Optimized/Alliance/: 01_10_Elwynn_Forest.lua, 10_12_Westfall.lua, 12_14_Darkshore.lua, 14_17_Darkshore.lua. Pattern: 1) Fetch VanillaGuide bracket from GitHub, 2) Get QIDs/coords from existing TurtleGuide zone guides, 3) Create optimized guide following VanillaGuide order with TurtleGuide data, 4) Update Guides.xml

title: Create Guides/Optimized directory structure
description:
Create the directory structure for optimized guides.

Steps:
1. Create Guides/Optimized/Alliance/
2. Create Guides/Optimized/Horde/
3. Create Guides/Optimized/Alliance/Guides.xml with Script includes
4. Create Guides/Optimized/Horde/Guides.xml with Script includes
5. Update main Guides.xml to include the Optimized subdirectories
